```{r}
api_key <- Sys.getenv("NY_TIMES_API_KEY")

url <- paste0("https://api.nytimes.com/svc/books/v3/lists/current/hardcover-fiction.json?api-key=", api_key)
response <- GET(url)
status_code(response)
content <- content(response, "text")
json_data <- fromJSON(content, flatten = TRUE)
#str(json_data)

df <- as.data.frame(json_data$results$books)

print("Json to Data Frame")
print(df)

```
